title: Spacious 3 bedroom house for rent
description:
A quiet neighborhood and wonderful neighbors...the perfect house for your family. This house has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, it is compact yet roomy. The entry, kitchen, bathrooms and laundry are tiled with carpeting in living room and bedrooms. The fireplace is located in the living room, with a large niche for your entertainment center. The bright kitchen invites you in the eat-in area with your family. The master bedroom has a sliding door leading out to the backyard concrete patio, the closet has mirrored wardrobe door and built-ins. The master bath has a bathtub with shower, carpet and tile... the 2 other bedrooms have mirrored wardrobe doors. Just down the hall is the the second bathroom and laundry room...and goes right out to the garage. The backyard is large enough for children to run around, or entertain your family and friends. Three ways to reach the backyard...maybe four...through the kitchen, through the master bedroom and out the side door of the garage...and there is the gate. Must see to appreciate. There are various walking trails throughout the community including a trail beginning at Chapman Heights Rd. and Oak Glen and ending near Chapman Heights Rd. and Gold Mountain. which is approximately 2 miles. Princeton Park is a little pocket park located off Princeton Dr. and Campus Way.
Please Call For More Information at: show contact info

title: Newly remodeled 1 bedroom/1-bath home with detached single garage.##++
description: LOCATION LOCATION! Marina del Rey adjacent/Silicon Beach, bright and airy, newly remodeled 1 bedroom/1-bathroom home with detached single garage with overhead storage, an electrical vehicle charger outlet is offered if required, there is a space in the garage that can be used for storage, a work bench or even a small office space, garage entrance is located on Braddock Drive, laundry hook ups are located in the garage. Upon entry you will find a welcoming open concept design, beautiful hardwood floors throughout the home, a stunning contemporary kitchen with beautiful countertops, backsplash tiles, side by side stainless steel refrigerator, stove and hood, microwave, dishwasher, stainless steel sink and hardware, neutral tone wood cabinets and hardware for lots of storage, there is a door located off the kitchen that leads outdoors to the west side of the property and for extra beach air flow and to the west side security. Two of three bedrooms have doors leading out to the backyard, the master has a small deck right outside the door. Both bathrooms are new with a contemporary design. Lots of recessed lighting, double paned windows throughout, new blinds, central heating and air conditioning, new water heater and electrical panel and a stacked washer and dryer. Updated landscaping front and back with fruit trees (peach, pear, loquat, and apple, automatic sprinklers and a gardener included. Three new security gates and fencing on three sides of the property to gain access to the backyard. Next to Playa Vista, Marina del Rey and Culver City, local markets and restaurants, shopping centers, Westfield Mall, Marina shopping center is 5 minutes away; close to the 91 and 405 freeways; 15 minutes to LAX airport; 20-25 minutes to DTLA, 5 minutes to downtown Culver City, 3 miles to the beach! La Ballona Creek bike path entrance is located blocks away for a 20 minute bicycle ride to the beach; public transportation within walking distance, close to schools. Small pets are allowed with a pet deposit (deposit will be determined on breed and size on pet). This is a must see home in a great area! Email to make an in-person appointment for a showing. Tenants pay ALL utilities, renters insurance required. Landlord pays for the Gardener. 1 year lease, 2 year lease is available. Tenant pay for all utilties, cable and internet. Renter's insurance required, Must have good credit and income. Landlord pays for gardener. Pet's will be considered with pet deposit (amount determined according to weight and breed)

title: Beautiful Family 3BR
description: This awesome Kirklyn twin has ALL THE I WANT'S! Tucked away on a side street yet close to all the main attractions, you'll spot this one, just because of it's amazing curb appeal. The roofed, open front porch, with vinyl fencing, is the perfect spot to relax at the end of the day and check out the happenings on this tree-lined street. As you step into this home, you'll be excited about the up to date colors and the great open floor plan. The living room features a gas fire place trimmed in a ceramic tile surround, and coffee colored walls. The dining room and kitchen are open to each other, separated by a granite peninsula. In the dining space you'll find a CF, 2 high slider windows on the side wall, a sliding doors that take you to the wide and deep deck, with 2 sets of steps, which overlooks the fabulous fenced yard. The IKEA kitchen will be a delight for cooks and non-cooks alike. The cabinetry is state of the art, some of which have a frosted glass insert. Granite countertops and a glass-tiled backsplash really set the tonne! Other amenities here include bamboo-like, interlocking floor boards, a recipe book shelf, a GE microwave and DW, recessed and pendant lights, a stainless sink, White fridge (not pictured), stove, and dish washer. The steps to the 2nd floor originate from the LR. Three good-sized bedrooms can be found here, as well as a hall bath. The MBR has tropical copper/orange walls, Berber wall to wall, a new CF, a TV recessed into the wall, new vinyl blinds and a closet BR #2 boasts a high chair rail, wainscoting and a double closet. The 3rd BR, comes equipped w/ double closet, grey w/ w and CF. The hall bath shows off a vanity sink w/ waterfall faucet, glass shelves. The basement is full & unfinished. There is a steel door that goes to the outside. The 100 amp electric service was upgraded in 2010.The gas Crown boiler heater was installed in '09.There are radiators and cast iron baseboards t/o. Other features of this lovely place include 6 panel doors, new siding('09), painted stucco, a concrete pad for the trash cans, and a storage shed. Walk to the bus on WC Pike or the Norristown line in nearby Highland Park. Township Line offers easy access to the Blue Route and Center City. A golf course is just across Lynn Boulevard. There are lots of eateries all up and down West Chester Pike, including the famous Pica's. You will really want to MAKE THIS ONE YOURS~

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available August 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.
